message.raw:
Resolved by pull request #506.

Gazebo 1.7.2 has been released with this fix included.  Binary packages are building now; the 64-bit Ubuntu Precise package should be ready in about 1 hour.

[Qualification instructions](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide#Creating_a_Qualification_Submission) have been updated, in particular, the procedure for [stopping a run](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide#Step_4:_Stop_a_Qualification_Task).

Official announcement regarding this change forthcoming from DARPA/OSRF.
